scenes.text: Welcome to the Real Estate Office. I can help with these services.
Which district would you like to purchase from?

I can help you buy a house in Wood District. but firt talk the your realtor for a walkthrough.

You will make a deposit today and your rent will be taken every 7 Minecraft days. Your deposit will be returned when you sell your house in good condition. Talk to your Realtor for more info

W1001 = Deposit: 250 Moneyz - Rent: 700 Moneyz
W1002 = Deposit: 250 Moneyz - Rent: 700 Moneyz
W1003 = Deposit: 250 Moneyz - Rent: 700 Moneyz

I can help you buy a house in the Diamond District. but firt talk the your relator for a walkthrough.

You will make a deposit today and your rent will be taken every 7 Minecraft days. Your deposit will be returned when you sell your house in good condition. Talk to your Realtor for more info.

D4001 = Deposit: 1000 Moneyz - Rent: 3700 Moneyz

The realtor will talk to me when your property in the Wood District has passed inspection.

After the Realtor completes an inspection of your property, they will sell your property and refund your deposit. If inspection fails you'll be reqired to take fix what your realtor details before you can request another inspection.
Which district would you like to sell from?

The realtor will talk to me when your property in the Stone District has passed inspection.

After the Realtor completes an inspection of your property, they will sell your property and refund your deposit. If inspection fails you'll be reqired to take fix what your realtor details before you can request another inspection.

The realtor will talk to me when your property in the Iron District has passed inspection.

After the Relator completes an inspection of your property, they will sell your property and refund your deposit. If inspection fails you'll be reqired to take fix what your realtor details before you can request another inspection.

The realtor will talk to me when your property in the Diamond District has passed inspection.

After the Realtor completes an inspection of your property, they will sell your property and refund your deposit. If inspection fails you'll be reqired to take fix what your realtor details before you can request another inspection.
